Front office team were welcoming, Agnes from housekeeping was grest, and Yousef in concierge was a great help providing site recommendations. I am sure the rest of the team and department as good as those individuals that we interacted with. It is of course all possible because of the great management. Behind every great team is a greater leader. The GM, Mr James is truly a good leader. His management style is absolutely making a big difference in the hospitality sector. He checked on our stay regularly despite his busy schedule. We appreciate it a ton! We recommend the

title: Amazing Food
desc: Good Food and amazing service team! Frenzy did gave a Great customer experience. Well recommended and will be back again………………………..⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️!

title: Fun times
desc: Perfect environment to hang out with mates. Nice view. Debbie from cook and brew westin did us good. Good service perfect recommendation for a good night. Do look for her if you want to have a good time

title: Good review
desc: Good scrumptuous food and exceptional quality services. The oysters are big and fresh. Waitress are very prompt to help us and friendly. The waitress will give recommendations. The view is spectacular.

title: Season Taste
desc: Excellent service from Joyce from Seasonal Taste. The food is nice , the service is good especially Joyce. One thing to recommend is there are no drink section other than coffee and tea . Will come again definitely .

title: Dinner @ Cook & Brew
desc: Food was good.. Ambience was great.. Thanks for acceding to our request of getting Window Seats.. No complaints at all.. Overall it was a memorable experience for us.. We are sure to come back again..

title: Good experience at Seasonal Tastes
desc: First visit here. Extensive food selection, friendly waiters and chefs. Water was always promptly refilled and chefs at different stations carried a smile. Seafood was very fresh and we enjoyed our evening here

title: Seasonal Taste @ Westin
desc: Food is fresh and most of the dishes are worth trying even though the spread may seem limited. Service staff - Bryan is very attentive and very accommodating to our request. The ice cream is wonderful!

title: Most satisfying buffet with a view to kill
desc: The Westin. Seasonal Taste at Level 32. Best view and great buffet. Wide selection of food to suit everyone. Good for family with kids. Courteous and Attentive Staff. Compliments to Bryan that serve us.

title: Best services from Cook & Brew staff!
desc: Fantastic services from Cook and Brew. Ariff, Ricci, Robbin are very professional. They tried their best level to fulfil the customer requirements. Highly recommended to have this team. Good job and well done!

title: One word: AMAZING
desc: Cook and brew has the BEST ambience and view out of all the lounges and bars I’ve ever been to. Comfortable and the staff were so friendly and lovely. Debbie and Marlon were very attentive and kind, we never had to wait for their attention and always had their kind service right round the corner. Thank you so much and I will keep coming back! The food is amazing and drinks are absolutely divine. Would recommend the silky honey cocktail. Simply amazing and had me ordering 2 more rounds of it!

title: Spacious and good spread of food varieties and good customer service
desc: The staff named Joyce (part timers) she’s very friendly and attentive. Good service provided by her. Oysters and prawns are fresh. Good spread of food varieties. Laksa is very tasty. Will come again!!

title: Singapore Trip
desc: THE WESTIN SINGAPORE IS SIMPLY THE BEST! This is thanks to their phenomenal service and care! (Huge credit goes to the Westin Club Lounge Team of JoJo, Sherlyn, Sherrain, Gabriel, Sarah, Casey!!) I took my mother for a birthday trip to Singapore, and is our first time visiting. After months of planning, researching, and preparation we decided to stay the The Westin Singapore, and had high expectations based from all the previous great reviews. We have been completely floored and pleasantly surprised at the level of first class service the amazing Club Lounge team provided us everyday during our visit. That is saying something after being jet-lagged from travelling from the US, and fearing we built up the hype too much - and they still surpassed them! The Westin Singapore

title: A Nightmare Experience at Westin Singapore
desc: Prepare yourself for an unvarnished account of the absolute disaster that was my stay at the Westin Singapore. While I must begrudgingly admit that the room itself was satisfactory, it pales in comparison to the monumental failures of the front desk staff. Their astonishing incompetence and blatant disregard for customer satisfaction have forever tainted my perception of this establishment. Let me start with the most egregious offense: their complete and utter failure to clarify the promotional offer I mentioned in passing during my booking. Instead of seeking clarification from me personally, they callously charged me the full price without any regard for my intention or understanding of the terms. Such a display of indifference and negligence is simply inexcusable. It

title: Perfect for business lunches!
desc: Had a business lunch of about 40 pax at Cook & Brew, service was great, attentive, prompt (Jack, and his team including Debbie) and food was very nice. One staff even went out of his way to help us solve a last min issue! View was fantastic too :)

title: A true 5 Star experience
desc: This hotel provides a true Five Star experience. The hotel has great facilities including a large fully equiped gym, a beautiful roof top pool area with plenty of sun beds and seating, and good food options. The rooms are very spacious and incredibly comfortable which made for a relaxing stay. The thing that made the stay the most memorable however was the incredibly friendly and helpful staff. Nothing was ever to much trouble and all of our requests were actioned immediately. We will definatly be staying here again the next time we visit Singapore.

title: Communication issues
desc: There is a major communication problem with the staff namely front desk and bell boy. On checkin the staff did not explain the available amenities and locations. On checkout, there was no warning of a bicycle marathon that blocked the city perimeter including the Westin. No taxis could access the hotel. We walked 1 kilometre and the event coordinator of the event had staff move the blocks that cordoned the event to allow safe exit out. This truly was the the last straw. A warning should have been provided upon checkin.

title: Love our stay at The Westin
desc: I stayed at The Westin with my parents for 3 nights. We loved the hotel very much. The location is very convenience. It is very very close to MRT. When you step outside from the building’s door, MRT gate is right there in front of you. The room was nice and clean. At night, no sound from outside disturbed our sleep. The bed was super comfortable. Food was great. We ordered room service twice at night during stay. We enjoyed our meals. What we loved here the most was breakfast. It had got many varieties of food and the presentation of breakfast looked nice and also delicious. I am a breakfast lover. I usually check the review of the breakfast at the hotel I would stay before I make reservation. I stayed at some other five-stars hotels and they offered many choices at breakfast

title: Great view of the Marina!
desc: The reception is at level 32. The view from live 32, as soon as walking out the elevator, was amazing! I was told that I got a free upgrade at the reception due to my member status, which I appreciate very much! The room is a corner room, with great views of the city and the Marina. Spacious! Nice king bed, with fluffy pillows. Went to 35th floor to check out its pool - must do. Wonderful few, and a good photo place. Loved it.

title: Fantastic pool , location , and professional staff
desc: I had a fantastic stay at the Westin Singapore and would highly recommend it to anyone visiting the area. The pool was absolutely lovely and provided a great place to relax and unwind. Additionally, the hotel's location was incredibly convenient, making it easy to explore all that Singapore has to offer. One standout aspect of my stay was the excellent service provided by Josephine in the breakfast section. She was incredibly professional and considerate, making sure that all of my needs were met and that I had a truly enjoyable dining experience. Her attention to detail and friendly demeanor made a real difference in my stay at the Westin, and I was truly impressed by her level of service. She even offered us a great dinner , but our schedule is full , so that we can not

title: Awesome dinner
desc: Location was super nice, Thai food selection was superb. Super thanks to Myra for her thoughtfulness and exceptional service and also to Ali for making our dining experience a very enjoyable and memorable one. Our teens enjoyed the ambiance as much as we did. We will definitely recommend and come back

title: Hospitality plus
desc: Beautiful views from check-in to the bar to the restaurants & even the bathroom! Service was impeccable from the concierge to everyone in the Seasonal Tastes restaurant & the Club lounge. The lounge offers evening snacks & drinks as well as a place to work or relax during the day. Gabriel & the staff keep the tables cleaned, drinks refilled & food refreshed. The adjacent patio & infinity pool offer options for families to eat & relax. Breakfast at Seasonal Tastes offers a huge selection of Asian & American foods. May helped me explore Laksa-a wonderful spicy stew that is prepared as you watch & was the perfect way to start the day. The rooms offer incredible floor to ceiling windows showcasing Singapore’s distinctive architecture & its tranquil harbor. But mostly I was

title: A Sensational Experience at Seasonal Taste
desc: The food and service was excellent. Fully deserve a 5 ⭐ rating. The dinner buffet at seasonal taste is highly recommend. My family and I absolutely enjoy our dinner at the Seasonal Taste at the Westin Singpore.

title: Total disappointment
desc: The service n attitude of the hotel staff were terrible. I was scared of the sudden electricity stop n all light out in the dark at my room, the staff n his manager explained in cold attitude that this is due to environmental policy, but they simply didn’t apologise for it or cared about my feelings. I requested for ice cube a few times due to my hand injury, they simply ignored my request n eventually still not provided that. I gave up n exhausted n disappointed with this $500 USD per night hotel experience.

title: Great Hotel with a great Team, easy access and great open views
desc: from the moment you walk out of the MRT station, (what is right next to the Hotel entrance) it was all a fantastic experience at Westin Singapore. Staying 5 days there in a nice corner Room, with the heavanly bed, it was an other dream stay. From the moment i walk in at the lobby friendly staff greeted me and offered help with the Luggage. Check in was swift as all info was provided via the Bonvoy Chat app before hand. Breakfast at the club Lounge and the Seasonal taste was great everyday. Associates where attentive and made sure i got my late everyday. Only was able to enjoy one Lunch at Cook & Brew, and it was fast and tasty business lunch. Can highly recommend. Housekeeping was fast and efficent everyday. Will definitely stay there again on my next visit to Singapore, great

title: Amazing Westin Singapore
desc: I have stayed at this hotel many times and much like a fine wine it just keeps improving with time. The team here seem to be highly motivated and genuinely wanting to please. Fab high end facility that is really well maintained! Keep up the great work and I hope to be back there again soon!

title: Great Location. Superb Service. Truly a 5 Star Luxury.
desc: Great hotel overall and I am very happy with my stay here.Located in the Marina Bay area juxtaposed by the Singapore's Central Business District, this place is walkable to a lot of place, including China Town and the shoppes at the Marina Bay Sands and Garden's by the Bay, with easy access to MRT or a taxi cab like I did. The service was amazing from all of the staff members starting from the checking in all the way to the room service and upkeep. My room was upgraded into a beautiful suite with 180 degrees of water view and the Marina Bay. A benefit of being a Marriott Ambassador loyal. Their lounge is amazing with so many food choices for breakfast, and the evening cocktails was very nice as well. Above all, I couldn't put emphasis enough on how impressed I was with the

title: Stunning Modern Hotel With Comfortable Rooms in Downtown Signapore
desc: This hotel is located in a skyrise with other businesses, so imagine our delight when we got off the elevator and walked into an incredibly beautiful lobby with high ceilings and exquisite modern decor, with the city lights shining in the background. We stayed here 2 nights and were very impressed with the service and comfortable rooms. I ordered room service and it was delicious. One of the best aspects is the large infinity pool and spa. I had a massage at the spa, and it was one of the best! Would definitely stay here again. The only downside is the hotel is located away from the lake, so you need to take a taxi to get to the heart of Signapore, or take a rather long walk.

title: Holding networking event at Cook & Brew
desc: Organised two networking events at Cook & Brew and both were a success thanks to the attentive, helpful staff. Cook & Brew is very accommodating to our needs and the staff Debbie and Jack did a great job in coordinating our event and making sure operations ran smoothly. Thanks for the pleasant experience!

title: Truly remarkable experience
desc: I had the pleasure of staying at the Westin Singapore for a few days over my birthday and truly enjoyed every moment along with all the staff interactions. The hotel is truly remarkable in every sense of the word. From the wonderful arrival experience, great food & drinks in both the lobby lounge and club to the beautiful room with view, you won't be disappointed in the slightest. I highly recommend the Westin Singapore to anyone visiting the area.

title: Nice
desc: Debbie is so friendly, so nice! Food amazing! It’s really a great experience in Cookand Brew 33rd floor! The view is so fantastic! Definitely, it’s so nice experience. Highly recommend to be here! Nice!

title: Value for money
desc: I had a wonderful time at this restaurant and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a great dining experience. The combination of delicious food, generous portions, and excellent service by Debbie made it truly memorable. Would like to come back again.

title: Great company & outstanding service
desc: Auntie Nui was really attentive to us and we definitely had a good time chatting with her. She is a very hardworking staff and very friendly. She also initiated conversations with us and we were glad that she was part of our experience at the hotel. She made us felt very welcomed, & would definitely recommend her for her outstanding service! ❤️ The hotel is honoured to have such a dedicated staff like her !! 🫶 We would like to thank Rakesh and Zyaira for their great service too, keep it up!!

title: Good and nice experience
desc: The place was relaxing and good to have friend gatherings or selfie time. A bit pricey but because of attentive staff special mentioned to “Debbie” and the young Indian guy” they are good staffs. I will come back here and hopefully we meet the same staffs or good service I experienced. Thank you guys

title: Good hotel with stressful moments.
desc: This is a good hotel, very well located at business offices, some nice walks around Marina and easy access to MRT.... Hotel itself & room are well equipped and to good standards. However being a 5-star hotel they need to improve on two topics: Reception: with check in & check out process lacks complete customer friendliness; moreover a Bonvoy Member there is no interaction of recognition, no question like "how was the stay?",....just a cool, dry, distant, very arrogant process ...awfull customer experience right there The breakfast is not included and pricey. But no problem for the price you might expect something, right? Friday morning before my business meetings, decent breakfast, relaxing atmosphere I could even prepare further my business presentations. But Sunday

title: Seasonal Tastes with Congenial Atmosphere
desc: Great place , great food , Fantastic service crew . Very attentive service team and welcoming manger especially Ms Zyaira. Food was great specially the cold seafood section. Well done The Westin !! Will definitely visit again.

title: Sanctuary in the midst of downtown Singapore
desc: We stayed as a family of three at Westin Singapore and it was our home far, far away! We were so tired from our travel and Gabriel from the lounge and Ofelia at check-in gave us the warm Marriott welcome, we immediately felt comfortable and relaxed. Gabriel went above and beyond to cater to us at the lounge. We felt very taken cared of, the room service followed our number of towels and water bottle requests, we even had a package delivered and they took care of that too! They considered our flight arrival and departure for our check in, check out times and we just felt safe! Food delivery was easy and convenient at concierge and everyone always had smiling faces! We always choose Marriott for our travels but Westin at Singapore was one of the highlights of our trip because of

title: Sensational!
desc: I stayed at the Westin for 8 nights since I was in Singapore for business. I would highly recommend staying there and will choose Westin again 100%. - Location is amazing: close to public transport, few meters away from Lau Pa Sat food Court, 20-30 mins walk from Garden By the Bay and Marina Bay Sand. - Room was absolutely perfect. I was glad to be upgraded to 45th floor, with a corner room which view was absolutely outstanding. Room is cleaned, perfectly well equipped for long / business stay (many plugs, large desk, large closet, shower AND bath). Room was always impeccable. - Breakfast on 32nd floor has an extensive selection of food, including fresh juices / smoothies, and eggs freshly prepared by the chef. Highly recommend taking breakfast there! - Gym is perfect: good

title: Great venue for a relaxing evening!
desc: We held an evening get together session with our clients at Cook and Brew. The venue is perfect with great decor and view. Food was delicious with an impressive selection of drinks. Most importantly, the crew serving us was fabulous where they were attentive to every details and service was really fast considering the place was full! Will definitely be back again soon.

title: Five star hotel, zero star buffet
desc: I went for a dinner buffet on Thursday (11/5). Not a great first impression! The range of food at the buffet is zero star (example for a 3 star hotel buffet) and the range is better). The seafood is not fresh enough, the hot food are tasteless and messy, and I have no appetite. The sashimi is not cut, because the hot food are cold, so I vomited several times. This is my worst dining experience.

title: Excellent service
desc: Staff Ariff is very attentive and friendly and he goes out of his way to please us. Congrats to the management for having such an excellent staff! Good job Ariff! Keep up the work! Will definitely recommend friends to your establishment.

title: Good dining experience
desc: Food was overall good. We ordered 2 starters & 2 mains: Duck Rillettes, Burrata, Roasted Sustainable Cod & the classic Cheese Burger. However, the Tiger Prawns, that came with the Cod was on the salty side and the skin of the Cod was not as crispy as desired. Fries that came with the Cheese Burger could also be better with less salt. Nonetheless, the food was fresh & well-made. Service is good as well, most servers are attentive & helpful.

title: Brilliant
desc: The food was great, the service awesome and the overall atmosphere / vibe just incredible. We had a great view of the city scape and coupled with the ambience and comfort of the restaurant, our party had a great time!

title: Awesome Food, Drinks, View and Vibes!
desc: Awesome food, drinks and vibes at Cook and Brew (located within Westin). The restaurant staff was very attentive and friendly, service was great! In addition, the view offered by the restaurant/hotel was woah wow wow! Great for taking photos and just enjoying the views. :))

title: Great stay
desc: My husband booked this hotel using his Platinum elite status. We attended a concert at the National Stadium which was about 20 minutes by taxi. It is a beautiful building and the staff were professional and efficient. It is located near many restaurants within walking distance. We requested 2 beds but settled for a King size bed. The room was clean and well equipped. The lounge was very nice and the breakfast and afternoon meals were quite good. Gabriel from the lounge was perfect. He anticipated our needs and everyone's and was very professional and pleasant. The lounge is probably one of the most efficient one I've been to so far and the view was spectacular. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Singapore.

title: Good dining experience at Seasonal Taste
desc: We went for a dinner buffet and received great customer service from all the service staff. Staff were courteous and smiley. Love the cosy relaxed environment. I'm impressed with the wide selection of fresh food, and certainly value for money. Nevertheless, there is room for improvement for the cooked food, hope that the chefs can work something out on this.

title: Great experience with great ambience
desc: The service is great. However, the food’s portion is pretty huge and abit too salty. Great ambience and atmosphere though! I love the view from my table and it is perfect for photo-taking. Overall a really lovely experience and would consider to return again.

title: Experience with Cook & Brew
desc: The foods menu has revamp but way better than previous. The food is awesome, quality is always maintain at best level, ambiance is great and the customer service is the best. Me and my husband always feel welcome whenever we are here. Debbie is always give her best service and she even remember me and my husband who came here frequently. Cook & Brew is always my first choice for dining and drinking place.

title: AMAZING EXPERIENCE
desc: wide variety of food with many choices ranging from seafood to laksa station to lobsters. the lobsters were absolutely delicious and the service was impeccable. really enjoyed my time here and would definitely come back again !!!

title: Compliments to Saravanan
desc: Awesome service by Saravanan! Good knowledge of products,, extremely attentive service, very personable and professional! Very thoughtful to ensure food comes at appropriate timing to pace the flow. Thank You!

title: A wonderful birthday night
desc: The atmosphere is extremely comfortable, the staff are amazing, the food is to die for. I was brought here by my partner to celebrate my birthday and it was a perfect evening. Definitely a place to come again.

title: A Birthday Dream (:
desc: The food here is simply amazing. Highly recommend the whipped ricotta and the cod. The view of both the city and the ocean gave topped the dinner off very magically. Franz took very good care of us throughout and was very attentive and sweet. Thank you for the lovely experience!

title: Great convenient location
desc: The hotel is very good value. The rooms are large and comfortable with great beds, good air conditioning and strong Wi-Fi. The bathrooms are good size with sufficient amenities provided. The service is friendly and efficient and polite. There is a good gym and very well maintained pool on level 35. The hotel is excellent for business or for a few days holiday. There are not many food options in the hotel itself but plenty very close by. All in a good choice.

title: Relaxing Weekend Lunch
desc: Visited Cook and Brew on the 33rd for weekend lunch. The ambience was excellent. Great and relaxing afternoon, with a fabulous view. Food was good, portion size is substantial. Service staff were welcoming and helpful. Great service from Franz.

title: Amazing service!
desc: Amazing service by Debbie while dining in the Cook & Brew. She was very attentive and ensured that our stay was pleasant and enjoyable. I highly recommend to come to Cook and Brew and enjoy the beautiful views and the amazing service and food.

title: Excellent!
desc: Excellent food and view! Lovely time at Seasonal taste to celebrate my husband's birthday 😊 lunch selection is not a lot but quality over quantity. Got 20% off via Chope App so good deal. Thanks for the great service.

title: Good for business and exploring town
desc: Westin Singapore is in the business district close to the Marina Bay area and about a 20-minute drive from the airport, SIN. The hotel is at Asia Square Tower 2, and starts at 32nd floor with the lobby, bar, and restaurant. On the 35th floor is the executive lounge, gym, outdoor pool, and spa. There is both shopping and restaurants and bars around the hotel, and you are only two stops away from Marina Bay or five stops to Orchard and ION shopping mall. The MTR is right outside the hotel. The rooms are generous and well planned, but for a longer stay, then book a suite. The club lounge has all-day drinks and snacks and serves breakfast as well as evening drinks and food. Overall, it is a good hotel for both business and exploring town.

title: Fab casual dinner at Cook & Brew
desc: Great place with a view, even better customer service. The supervisor Debbie and our server S were the best. Food was great - we had a nice balanced fresh and savoury starters of burrata and duck rilettes. Our mains were good although I preferred my companion's roasted cod over my C&B's classic burger. My only minor concern and it was my bad for not requesting it is less salt/sodium cos I'm extra sensitive to salt taste. Besides that, great meal. Come and visit!

title: Very peaceful with stunning view
desc: I did my massage & really enjoy the treatment by one of Spa Therapist Matra very skilled & from start to end. After the treatment, they have small self served tip bits & tea served in lounge peaceful & relaxing environment. If you are looking for silence to unwind with a stunning view while dipping in a whirlpool I highly recommend trying it out. Shout out to staffs Jib, Eunice & adi who were very friendly & sweet

title: Perfect Wedding Venue
desc: From the initial enquiry to the execution of our wedding dinner, the Westin level of service was exceptional. Wedding package: 10/10 One of the best hotel banquet packages out of all the ones we considered especially if booked during a promotion. We had a Peking duck station during cocktails and that was a huge hit. It added a fun vibe to the usual cocktail/canapés offerings out there. Westin offers juices in addition to soft drinks for the cocktail session which we felt were great non-alcoholic options- not many other hotels offered this. Location: Located right outside the Shenton Way MRT- super convenient location for guests attending, whether rain or shine. Ballroom: Initially concerned that the layout of the ballroom might be too long and narrow but we had our stage in

title: Great new hotel, good views & access to MRT
desc: Great new hotel, convenient location just in Asia Square, 5min walk to MRT. Hotel is lovely, room are a decent size. There was some building work outside our windows (42nd floor) which it would have been nice to get a heads up to make sure the curtains were drawn. Made relaxing difficult due to the noise. View was good, we were looking out onto the Marina Bay and could see the fountain show. Pool was great but gets crowded mid afternoon. Ate at the Cook and Brew restaurant, view were good, food was decent but basically burger ans chips. Reception were superb, Irish Joy checked us in and was super helpful.

title: Excellent client focussed staff and great location
desc: My husband and I recently spent four nights at the Singapore Westin Hotel. It has been 15 years since we last visited Singapore and much has physically changed in the city during this interval of time. We marveled at the spectacular architecture of the Hotel. Reception is located on the 32nd floor with fabulous views. Ditto for our room on the 41st floor. However, it is the staff of the Hotel that deserve equal and even more accolades. All staff that we met have been first class in their devotion to client service. In particular we would like to mention Bobby at the Front Desk, the restaurant team from Seasonal Tastes - Zyaira, “Aunty” Maria, Margareth, Berlin and Moi Tee. The Concierge team Yusoff, Taib and Ben were excellent. Whilst we understand that the limousine

title: Consistently great
desc: 2nd stay this year. Shoutout to James for running a fantastic hotel with exceptional staff everywhere. Housekeeping did a fantastic job of keeping our rooms clean even with 2 children and my daughter can't stop talking about breakfast and the pool. We look forward to many return visits here.

title: Excellent stay at Westin 🌹
desc: We had a wonderful stay at the hotel..food were ready good 👍🏻 & services standards were 6 stars ! We would like to complement the team leads by Mr Alex Liau who delivered excellent top class services to our guests during our stays at your hotel ! Bravo 👏🏻 to all of you ! 🌹😘 & we will certainly recommend the hotel to our families & friends in the future !👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻

title: Very good
desc: Nice ambience and interesting food with great and friendly staff especially Franz who proactively catered to our requests as soon as possible. Staff allowed us to shift tables as soon as possible and refilled our cups quite fast and are very attentive to us.

title: Excellent food n service at Seasonal Tastes
desc: Love the tasty food at Seasonal Tastes. Christopher is very attentive n responsive to the needs of the guest, very very impressive with his great service! Alex Chong n another tall slim guy (sorry forgot to get his name) was offering great services too, This is the second time we came this month to this great restaurant , really superb food, service and ambience . Haven't tried anything that l don't like on the spread, gd job to yr chefs and cooks for creating such a great menu. Will come back again in Sept with the rest of my family.

title: Birthday Dinner @ Cook & Brew
desc: Brought my girl to Cook & Brew for a nice birthday dinner! we love the food, love the ambience and love the outdoor settings too! a big special thanks to Marlou for the great hospitality and services! will visit back here very soon!

title: Great hotel and location
desc: Beautiful hotel, elegant room, and great views of the city. Great location, easy walk to Marina Bay and close to many good food options (especially Lau Pa Sat). Also a very nice infinity pool on the 35th floor - definitely check it out.

title: Top notch
desc: This Westin location holds the bar! This was our first visit to Singapore, and we chose the location for its proximity to Marina Bay and a hawker center. The concierge on the first floor was attentive, helping with direction, getting the elevator, and booking our transport back to the airport. Once on the 32nd floor, I felt like I was in luxury with the smell and sound. We had two rooms, and each room felt like they had separate entry areas. The beds and pillows were heavenly as advertised. Water was replenished daily and the chocolates at turndown were delicious. Another plus if you’re international, there’s an adapter in the drawer! Such small details make a big difference. The only improvement I could nitpick… they need a timer on the tv and a bidet. We were a family of 6 and

title: Full-day meeting at The Westin, Asia Square
desc: We just had our full-day meeting event on 21st July and we are impressed by the exceptional service and delicious food at The Westin, Asia Square, Ballroom 2. Our event went smoothly and all of these are not possible without the dedicated staff delivering world-class services throughout our event. Special thanks to Jocelyn Ow and Alwin who are responsible for ensuring service delivery is always top-notch. The entire team's commitment to excellence is evident, and we look forward to returning soon.

title: Wedding review at the Westin!
desc: I recently held my wedding at the Westin on 1st July 2023.i must say it was a awesome decision by me and my wife. The location was fantastic and we would like to give huge praise to Yan Hui for managing our wedding programme very well even when im always overseas. Big thanks to Alvin as well who was there to assist us on the wedding day itself making sure everything goes as planned. Lastly to the head chef and catering staffs, the food was great and everyone had huge praise for it. Well done!

title: Check in blues
desc: The reception staff was clearly unhappy with her job and had not even one iota to welcome and be at least polite Which staff would actually demand a private email communication from Westin to “confirm” a booking We reserved for a double bed days before arrival Upon arrival . She asked us for the names of the people but then told us only 1 bed . How do they expect 4 pax in a bed … Beautiful check in experience!!! 1* check in experience for a 5 star hotel is completely unacceptable

title: Bday celebration.
desc: Had a great lunch with my girl frnds. The food are great! And value for the money during promotion Above all the service are amazing. I would like to thank Zyaira, Insyirah, Candy and Rakesh who assisted us and gave their warm and amazing service. Above all really appreciate Zyaira for her excellent service.

title: 32nd wedding anniversary made special by the Westin Singapore!
desc: Our 32nd wedding anniversary trip was VERY special due to the Westin Singapore!! The Front Desk staff (Fiona), Concierge team (Ben), Club Lounge (Casey) and GM (James) really made us feel at home and special throughout our 7-day stay. My wife & I are both Titanium Platinum Bonvoy members and we felt this status due to level of service and attention to detail from the ENTIRE Westin team. The hotel views are amazing. We stayed on the 44th floor and could see both the water & city. Location is perfect near multiple MRT lines and walking access to several iconic Singapore sites such as the Merlion Park (15 minutes), Chinatown (15 minutes) and there is a great hawker within 5 minutes from the hotel. We requested an early check-in (9:30am) which was seamless. They offered us

title: Not 5 star service
desc: The hotel is located high up with amazing views. The rooms are modern and have everything you need. There is a spacious bathroom with a free standing bath, separate shower and toilet. Being Marriot Bonvoy members, we normally get a room upgrade - which we didn't get. I asked why, understanding if the hotel was full, we would not be getting it but the check in agent said they had given us a high floor room as the upgrade - a better view. When we went to our room, we were only two floors up looking onto the pool and there were a few floors above us. Definitely not a higher floor. With regards to breakfast, I have seen better ones. On a few occasions we had to ask for more glasses for the juices, more plates for the food. We had to ask for food options to be restocked.

title: Kicked out of room - Family of 4 including a 90 year old
desc: We were so excited to stay at the Westin Singapore for 2 nights. Lobby was clean. Area had a good food court around the corner Monday thru Friday but the service at the Front Desk was lacking. We had a return flight home that was 1:50am the next morning so we asked when we checked in if we could pay for a late checkout as we had a 90 year old with us and wanted to give her a chance to rest before going on 2 long flights to get home. The front desk person was very nice and we asked what the cost is if we had the room until 8pm.and she quotes a little over 500 SGD. We mentioned our flight was at 1:50am and asked if maybe 9pm would be better. The front desk checked the price and said it would be the same since we were paying a half day rate. It was our last day there in

title: Beautiful stay, great central location
desc: This is a beautiful hotel with stunning city views and an even more stunning infinity rooftop swimming pool and patio. We had daily breakfast at the restaurant - excellent selection of food choices and breathtaking views, no wonder the restaurant got so busy on weekends. Concierge lounge had coffee, TWG tea, San Pellegrino, water and soft drinks during the day, fruits, cookies, and dried fruits/ nuts. Evening snacks were tasty but limited and got repetitive from day to day. We stayed for 7 nights. Kids are now allowed in the lounge (this is common for Singapore hotels), but they have a beautiful outdoor patio just outside the lounge, where families with kids can enjoy lounge food and drinks. Gym was nicely equipped with a beautiful view. Location - in the Financial District

title: A Very Relaxing Saturday.
desc: Had a great Saturday afternoon and evening at Cook & Brew. Great ambience and view. Not much crowd in the afternoon, not noisy and no loud music, so it was very relaxing. The staffs were very friendly and polite. A special mention to the Restaurant Supervisor Ms Debbie who was very attentive and friendly. The food was great, enjoyed the truffle honey toast very much. Will definitely revisit.

title: My first time at Westin Hotel Singapore-Seasonal taste
desc: Went here with my friends for the first time!Was welcomed by very friendly and accommodating staff! For example we met staff Zyaira,Invyiral,Cindy,Rakesh who were always willing to help accommodate our needs!Would definitely recommend and come back again😊🙏

title: Excellent experience
desc: Very good food (high tea) and staff were very friendly and accommodating! Allowed changes to the set due to dietary requests :) Kept coming back to check on us and even presented a free cake for our anniversary! 10/10

title: Cook & Brew nice environment and view. Good place to chill.
desc: Service at the Cook and Brew is friendly especially Kannan. Food is great and fantastic view. Will visit again when back to Singapore. The Canadian Pork Chop is very tender a must try dish. Attentive Service from the restaurant. Cosy n nice Bar feel. See u again.

title: Fresh seafood
desc: Nice environment and nice view to enjoy the buffet. There’s quite a variety of different cuisine available , sashimi and seafood were pretty fresh. Service is good. Will definitely come back next time

title: Beautiful hotel!
desc: Beautiful clean hotel! Large rooms and delicious extensive breakfast. Platinum status was recognized and nice benefits were included for platinum members (breakfast, club lounge access, etc). We only stayed one night but would have loved to stay longer!!

title: Great Cocktails at Cook & Brew
desc: A great place to relax over a drink. Beautiful view of the port, great ambiance and if the weather is good, they have lovely outdoor seating. If you like cocktails, make sure you ask for Marlou, he’s an excellent mixologist and will hook you up with some delightful drinks! The food I’ve tried there is pretty good too!

title: Great experience
desc: Had lunch buffet at seasonal taste with my wife and kid. Great food and friendly staff! Nice choice of dessert and fresh fruits. Especially recommend the beef and the sashimi. Staffs are all friendly and helpful. Will definitely come back again.

title: Best view and beers!
desc: Excellent environment, choice of music and chilling vibe to have your drinks or your favourite beverages. Shout out to Debbie! Always greet us with a great smile. Recommend to visit while in the area!

title: Great hotel for business and healthy life style
desc: Great hotel. Room perfectly good with great beds, separate shower and bath and a nice desk to work from. Gym is well equiped and staff are great. Eddie who leads the runs in the morning with guests loves sharing his knowledge of the city.

title: Westin Singapore highly Recommended
desc: This is an amazing property with fantastic amenities. Rooms are beautiful and the Jr suite has everything from an espresso coffee maker to Bose mini deck stereo and a powder room, a big bathroom with a huge soaker tub. The breakfast buffet is simply amazing selection of Laska, Congee, Dim Sum, bacon & egg, sausage, omelets, fruits, juice bar, parties and more!! Wow! The staff are very attentive and super helpful and so friendly. I used the pool and it has an infinity edge that gives the illusion of hanging over the city(not scary at all) and is so relaxing and so refreshing in the Singapore heat. Pool service tops off the experience to have a refreshing drink and snack to top it all off. Also, there is a Concierge lounge for the Bonvoy members that serves lighter side of

title: Timing derailed what would have been perfect
desc: Arrived for 5 nights at the Westin Singapore with my wife. Me business and her shopping. Location is fabulous with the Lau Pa Sat Hawker markets literally across the road. Plenty of great restaurants too. Room was a modest upgrade as the Grand Prix was the coming weekend and the hotel was fully booked. That said we did have access to one of the best club lounges in South East Asia. Drinks from 5.00pm to 8.00pm, and canapés that could double as a nice dinner should one be inclined, from 5.00pm to 7.00pm. Unfortunately I had dinners out each evening but did have the opportunity of pre dinner drinks, and the service and choice was excellent. All other facilities were also of the highest standards, such as the pool, gym, concierge services, buffet breakfast. Unfortunately our timing

title: Nice and fine dining meet up
desc: We had the nice time last night. We catch up and meet up our friendly big brother. We celebrated my Mom’s birthday. So, once the associates knew, they made a surprise to my Mom with yummy tiramisu ruhmn cake in cup and raisin ice cream scoop. They also had option for vegetarian. Must try “impossible beef” burger. Highly recommend. All of the staff is skillful. Nice view with the quay and port view The pork chop, calamari are also nice. Definitely will come back

title: The Westin Singapore
desc: The Westin Singapore was outstanding. We especially enjoyed the Club Lounge with a beautiful view and delicious food. Casey, Ruben, Gabriel and Sarah took great care of us while we were there and were very gracious. It was also an easy walk to get to the Marina Bay - a good location.

title: Dining with great view at Seasonal Tastes
desc: Delicious food with great views. Served by Zyaira and Moi Tee. Very polite and great customer service. Had an enjoyable birthday celebration. Thank you so much. Favourite food are popiah and kway pie tee.

title: Great service, great location and great pool
desc: On a weekend trip to Singapore on route to Vietnam, I was fortunate to stay at the Westin Hotel. Great location with easy walking distance and access to parks and local restaurants. Bright and fantastic modern rooms. Also having an amazing roof infinity pool where you can see 180 degree city view. Plenty of lounges and space around the pool. Excellent, helpful and polite staff offering a welcoming drink when you check in and giving a very welcomed stay at the Westin. A hotel which is a credit to the Starwood chain. Throughly recommended it.

title: Always a good option
desc: Not the most central hotel to the main hubs of Singapore but is close to the business district. Walkable to Marina Bay Sands and Chinatown. Only a short stroll to La Pau Sat Hawker Center which is a great lunch or dinner option. Rooms are spacious, great service and good meeting rooms.

title: Excellent Club floor
desc: Very nice Club floor with brilliant views and very service orientated people. The breakfast was very good and the cocktail time good fun with a wide range of food an drinks. The gym is nice but could do with a free weight bench-press as there is plenty of room.

title: A good time!
desc: After finished my business trip, decided to spend couple days in Singapore so chose Westin to enjoy the city. Nice location and wonderful service, I got a corner room with excellent harbour view. I can see harbour even when I was in beth. in stead of breakfast restaurant, I had a perfect in room breakfast in the morning. Enough time for me to pack and enjoy the morning at the same time. I went to a night market by walk, very convenient location, you can also walk to Marina Bay Sand if you like.

title: Great New hotel in City Centre
desc: Large and modern rooms. Easy access from a metro station. A slight negative is that there is not much shopping areas nearby, being sited within the financial district. For a SPG Category 5 hotel, this is good for point redemption. Elite members are recognised. Lobby is located on a high floor and even from there, a great sunset view can be seen. Rooms are relatively large with modern amenities. Highlight of the stay is the infinity pool on level 35 (?). 2 things to note : 1) beware that certain items such as the drinks which are not complementary, are electronically tagged, so you are charged even if you lift up the bottle, 2) the hotel is situated amongst office buildings, so draw the blinds in the bathrooms when needed. Recommend to visit Lau Pa Sat, an open air street food

title: Great Hotel
desc: The Westin Hotel is a great hotel at great location. It's located near Marina Bay Area and shopping complex. Having big conference halls for business purposes etc. We went there to attend Procurement Leaders Awards Forum in last year and really enjoyed the hotel and facilities.

title: Great stay overall
desc: It was a great stay overall. The hotel is located very close to financial center and as such was perfect for a business trip. Room was spacious and clean and staff was very friendly and accommodating.

title: Five stars
desc: This review is long overdue. My husband and I stayed here in January for 3 nights and totally loved this hotel. The service here was impeccable. There was not one staff we encountered that weren't at the top of their game. The lobby area upstairs is beautiful. Lots of comfy chairs and couches to relax. In the evening there is someone playing a grand piano which was awesome. Up on the roof is a gorgeous pool and loungers. We didn't try the gym but it looked very nice. Our room was beautiful as well. Nice sunken bathtub with floor to ceiling windows looking over the harbour, super comfortable bed and spotlessly clean. We ate in the restaurant every morning and the food and service was excellent. Great location too. Close to MRT station as well as Lau Pa Sat Hawker centre

title: Great hotel for business and tourists!
desc: This hotel is new, modern, nice, great location, friendly accomodating staff and so relaxing! It is in the business district but very easy to get around anywhere. I like that it is not as crowded as the other tourist hotels, yet you can still walk to restaurants, markets, catch the train "walkable" or taxi easily anywhere. Singapore is not a big place so even though this hotel is not located in "tourist area", still so easy to get around. It was nice for me to be close to office, out of the hustle and bustle, yet the times I wanted to go explore, it was quite easy! The hotel itself is clean, modern, and relaxing atmosphere. Rooms are spacious and modern. The pool was phenominal! Did not use but spent some time sitting out there looking at the city. I only got to order room

title: Awesome bed
desc: The room, bed, facilities were awesome, not so about the location. Since it's located near the offices, many restaurants nearby closes early or don't even operate on weekends. For eating wise, you might need to dine in or if not, call for delivery (if the hotel allows)

title: Best hotel ever in singapore
desc: our room was great and the cleanliness was amazing. i loved the bathroom and the club lounge was small and nice. i loved the swimming pool area. the hotel also had a great location to all shopping and restaurants. the hotel had a train station less than 100 metres up the street so you had access to the metro.

title: Good business hotel
desc: It is a good business hotel with all the modern facilities. The staff is very courteous. Rooms are equipped with all the amenities. There are adequate business meeting rooms. The location is good and most of the nearby places can be covered easily.

title: One of the best hotels in SG
desc: Clean, fancy, very good facilities and one of best customer services I have experienced in Asia. Been there 3 times in the past 2 years and always had a great stay. Beds are super comfortable, breakfast buffet is VERY good and the pool is nice. It's a pity the interrupted view as from the pool you can only have a (small) partial view of Marina Bay and the building in construction will obstruct also the view of the sea when completed.

title: First-class hotel
desc: Stayed here for 1 night, rooms were massive, well appointed and new. Furnishing were very modern and clean. The view of Singapore's Central Business District (CBD) was amazing. Toilet had a huge bathtub for soaking inside. Room service was excellent, food served was warm and with a friendly smile. Only downside is the location is not ideal if you want to visit the sights and attractions of the rest of Singapore. Other than that, nothing to fault.

title: Great hotel for business travel located in the center of the business district.
desc: The property is very private with the lobby on a high floor so you don't have random people showing up in the lobby. The hotels and rooms are chilled and very well maintained. The rooms are very quiet and have the latest technology for lighting, bathrooms and the TV. The rooms have great views of the City and one does not hear any noise due to the thick windows. Bathrooms are modern and have high quality fittings. I ate at both restaurants and the food is good quality. The spa and gym are worth using and they have a nice pool on a high floor(outdoor). I go back and stay there regularly. Service is good and the property is very well maintained.

title: Beautiful, central property
desc: I'm an SPG platinum member and got upgraded to a terrific room, with a great view over the water. Lovely sitting area, huge superbly comfy bed, great stylish bathroom. Beautifully decorated and so well designed. We had access to the lounge which was great - big, great staff team who remember things like how you like your tea, whether it's a gin and tonic or a beer at cocktail hour, which fruit you like at breakfast - they even (without asking) got me watermelon which had run out on the buffet. Fantastic pool terrace with a view that just cannot be equalled. The staff were all fantastic from the doormen to front desk to the brilliant house keeping team. This is a Westin at the very top of their game. We've stayed in a few great places in Singapore but this is the new

title: Excellent rooms
desc: As usual Westin did not disappoint. Room is spacious and comfortable, Bathroom design and size are outstanding. Clun lounge is very good, comfortable and food selection is very decent. Hotel is in a good quiet location, all is good but customer service could be improved.

title: Excellent five-star hotel in Singapore!
desc: The Westin Singapore is pretty new hotel located at Marina Bay with lovely views over the Singapore Bay. When you arrive at the building you have to use an elevator to get to the main lobby on the 32nd floor. The main lobby is beautifully designed with floor-to-ceiling windows and spectacular views. The hotel has amazing infinity pool located on the 35th floor and a world-class 24-hour fitness studio. Our room was very spacious with king size bed, small working area, large marble bathroom with bathtub and separate shower and all amenities needed. The bed was amazing! It was so comfortable and the bed linen were so soft that we did not want to get up! We also received a welcome note and delicious cookies from the Westin staff members. We had an amazing dinner at their

title: Large rooms and great views.
desc: Clean large modern rooms, great city & bay views, friendly staff, great ambiance, comfy lobby lounge with great views of the port. Try Cook and Brew, unwind and relax, decent food and drink selection.

title: Excellent for a weekend stay in Singapore
desc: Excellent, high quality hotel. The lobby is gorgeous, complete with evening pianist. The reception was slow at check-in but once we received our room keys they were helpful to give us maps and suggest places to eat and sight see. The infinity pool and rooftop lounge is very nice, take advantage and at least go up once to see the views. Definitely recommend this Westin hotel and spending time in Singapore!

title: A good place to stay in Singapore
desc: The location and the design of this Westin is unique and the service higher than expected. People are really dedicated to you and try to make your stay comfortable. As usual for Westin it is really clean, the bed is amazing and the room size perfect. The only one point is the in room dinning, choice can be largest.

title: Good Hotel but...
desc: Couldnt fault the Hotel as everything worked well and all staff were very hospitable. Beautiful views across the bay. The Lobby Bar is soul-less. Good for business but not exactly child-friendly. I liked the 'running concierge' concept - very good idea for those that are in town only for a few days and want to catch up on their daily jogs.

title: “Love the location and good Restaurant”
desc: I stayed at the Westin Singapore Hotel for three days for a special occasion. The upgraded our room to harbor view, room was very neat and modern. I had a beautiful view overlooking the harbor I loved its very relaxing and romantic. The restaurant is outstanding; I enjoyed the sea food buffet. Overall my staying in this hotel was marvelous, the staff they all are very helpful, always smiling!!! I was treated very well by all of them!!

title: 업무중심지와 가깝고 특히 조식이 훌륭
desc: I stayed at this hotel during my biz trip. this hotel located very closely to office area. I saw sea view in my room and room condition was very good I strongly recommend to have a breakfast in hotel. They served really good and delicious food for guest.

title: Luxury stay in the heart of city center
desc: Stay there for a short break in Singapore with my husband. The hotel was located in the down town area and in the city center, with MRT station nearby, very convenient and easy access to commercial district. There were office building nearby and so we had breakfast there. (as the room rate did not include breakfast). The room was huge , clean and comfortable (elegant and luxury style). Swimming pool (infiity pool) was another big bonus in the heart of a robust city. Easy walking distance to the Lau pau sat food center.

title: New, modern business travel
desc: We started in a room where the sleeping area had no windows, the walkway to the bathroom and the bathroom had all the windows. Odd placement if you were hoping for a view. Staff was excellent, and amenities were great. Workout room sufficient and infinity pool relaxing.

title: Hotel in Business District
desc: This is a 5 star business hotel, ideal for those who need to go to work nearby. It you are a tourist, it is a little far from tourist attractions, but the MRT station directly opposite the hotel would make up for that. The nearby Lau Pa Sat is also a huge draw for great local food. The hotel facilities are what you find in a standard high end business hotel. Service is impeccable, rooms are larger than the usual teeny city hotels. We had an enjoyable stay.

title: Good location with great facilities
desc: The location is good as I can walk to the MRT station in 3 minutes. When I checked in the first day, my room was so smelly and I requested a change. After 2 hours, they gave me a different room in the same floor without any strong smell. Thank you for the prompt action. Some of the staffs are friendly and some are not. I used to call for something from Front Desk and I had to call again after 30 minutes for same request. I think they had forgotten to do it. The breakfast selection is not that many but the view from the eating place is great. I can get Gluten-Free breakfast here. ^_^ After all, I enjoy my stay here as I can see they are trying their very best to provide the good service at all time.

title: Magic Spot
desc: Stayed at the Westin for a week in May 2016 and it was fantastic. The hotel was beautiful. Was my first time in Singapore so I didn't know what to expect. The staff were very friendly and obliging. The facilities were great including and especially, the infinity edge pool on the 35th floor. Drinking cold Corona in the pool while taking in the view is a very good way to spend time in that very hot climate. The restaurants in the Westin were excellent as were the bars. Very stylish Hotel. Not sure when I will be back in Singapore but I know where I will stay when I am.

title: Literal heights of luxury
desc: Located at the edges of CBD, the Westin is a fantastic (if slightly more expensive) business hotel. Located on the top floors of an office building, it has great views of the city and the port, though it might soon lose the views on one side due to a building under construction. The rooms, especially the club rooms on the highest floors, are very tastefully done up. Westin prides itself on the quality of its beds, and there is no doubt the heavenly bed in mine was sleep-inducing. The bathroom is really quite luxurious, with a quirky bathtub and a gigantic shower room. The quality of the toiletries and the in-room goodies are of high quality, as should be expected. The food served in in-room dining was pretty good too. Because I had booked through the Starwood website, I had

title: Fantastic stay, even more fantastic pool!
desc: We stayed at three hotels on our week long trip in Singapore to try out different places. We stayed at the Westin, ParkRoyal on Pickering, and The South Beach Singapore. While all was fabulous, the Westin was by far our favorite. Quick and efficient check in with a HUGE room (two queen beds) that had great views of the Marina District. A heavenly bed meant we slept soundly, and the staff went out of their way to make our stay comfortable. But the real treat was the pool with a great view of the harbor. While there is construction going up, there is still a view, and it's certainly not the end of the world as others have indicated. It's also not crowded and incredibly relaxing. The gym was also fantastic and really appreciated the cleanliness and amenities for travelers

title: A relaxing stay in a vibrant city
desc: Our first time in Singapore and it didn't disappoint! On arrival the Hotel staff were friendly, polite and very helpful making us feel very welcome. The decor is modern and stylish throughout with large rooms and comfortable amenities. We did have to change rooms as the bath leaked, however the hotel staff swiftly rectified the issue and gave us a new room within 10 minutes - one with a sea view. I say sea view, however a new hotel is currently being built which does obstruct what would be a lovely sea view! This was the only down side to the hotel. The infinity pool had a lot of space for loungers and staff are very helpful, sadly the view of the sea is now partially obstructed buy the new hotel being built. Noise could be heard from the construction site which was a little

title: well appointed rooms but pretty average food
desc: Not a huge fan of this area of Singapore but I guess that's not the hotel's fault. My room was large and well appointed with a good sized work desk and a view of the pretty fabulous looking infinity pool. But not that impressed with the food that was on offer there, really expected a higher standard.

title: Great room with fantastic amenities
desc: I stayed in the Westin for 6 nights, 7 days on a official trip and I am very pleased with the services and facilities on offer. I will write this review split across various aspects as follows: Location This was the biggest plus for me as far as the entire trip is concerned. Hotel is located in Asia Towers, which was right next to my office. Hotel is easy to reach and in the heart of what I assume to be the CBD of Singapore. Once you reach the foyer, there is always someone to receive you and help you with the luggage once you get out of the taxi, call and hold the elevator to reception. The check in process was smooth and was welcomed with a refreshment drink. Priscilla was nice and warm. One issue was that my luggage did not reach my room in a timely manner and I had to

title: Excellent
desc: Wonderful rooms! I stayed quite high up in the building so the view was amazing. Service was impeccable and the infinity pool was beautiful, even though water temperature was quite cold. I didn't even want to go to my meetings in the mornings, but just stay at the hotel.

title: Posh
desc: Just stayed a night for a business trip. Got super lucky to have upgraded to a bigger room. The bathtub was really something, when it's just next to a large window overseeing the city. The room is huge, staff friendly and helpful. Two things that I would like to bring up: 1) There is a large mirror right near the bed next to my "head position". Not too fond of that design. 2) I feel that it's much more difficult to get a taxi in this hotel than in other hotels I stayed in SG. And I can easily turn into aquaman (all sweat) at the hotel taxi queue.

title: Fantastic luxury hotel!
desc: This hotel was superb! The service fantastic from all staff and the rooms were beautiful. * The amenities - The pool was the best thing to happen to humid singapore however the view is no minimal with the new buildings. The hotel is full equip with everything you need. If you want to do a work out leave you gym wear at home and use their fitness program to get shoes for $5. This also comes with short and shorts but if your a Westerner like myself. I would recommend bring your own shorts. You can get free wifi by joining the starwood program for free. * The hotel - The hotel is elegant and beautiful with a piano player in the lobby you can relax to at night with a cocktail at the bar. It is in a busy business district that is unknown to varies cab drivers so be aware. It is

title: Outstanding
desc: Views are amazing! Room was clean, comfortable and well maintained. Bed was excellent. Staff was more than accommodating, friendly and welcoming; management went out of their way. Food and bar were excellent. Location is perfect! I have another favorite in Singapore, but this one is winning it over!

title: High standard business hotel
desc: One of the newest hotels in Singapore, perfect for business trips, near most of the major banks. Not a great location for tourists. Bar and restaurant are ok, but very quiet. Standard Westin beds, quality shower, good business facilities.

title: Fantastic hotel with great service
desc: I stayed at The Westin Singapore on a business trip. It was in a perfect location, by Marina Bay, and across the road from the Downtown MRT station, making it easy to travel anywhere on the island. My Executive Room was large, with a huge, very comfortable bed, good work space, and generous bathroom, with a large bath that had views over the marina. Breakfast was fantastic with a very wide selection available from the buffet, including some hot food which was cooked on demand. I dined in the hotel restaurant one evening and the food was excellent. Staff throughout the hotel were friendly and very helpful. I would definitely chose this hotel for my next trip to Singapore!

title: Top escape and central adress in Singapore
desc: We stayed here as a family of three with our teenage son for 4 nights and found the place perfect as most attractions where within walking distance. Also the quality of breakfast sreved was excellent and what we really loved was there spa and roof top pool! Very friendly and helpful front office staff and the concierge was a sait and helped us getting to see as much as possible even on such a short stay!

title: Exceeded my expectations
desc: I should start by saying that my husband and I stayed here in June as part of an SPG redemption so given we hadn't paid anything and knew the hotel was in the middle of the business district, my expectations weren't all that high! However, we both loved this hotel! We found it actually to be very central for everything we wanted to do in Singapore, eg walking distance to Marina Bay Sands, Lau Pa Sat, China Town, Telok Ayer, Clarke Quay etc and within a 5 minute walk from both Downtown and Raffles Place Underground stops. Our room was massive too, with a very comfortable bed, huge bathroom, walk in shower and great views west over Chinatown and sunsets every evening. Staff were always very helpful when we asked them for information and the pool was a nice addition to be able

title: Almost Perfect
desc: Spent a couple of nights at this sharp and modern business hotel nestled right in the middle of Singapore's CBD. Situated in the high floors of the imposing looking Asia Square towers, the hotel oozes class the moment i stepped into its level 32 lobby. Overlooking the coastal line at Keppel, the view is outstanding and the staff were courteous and professional, greeting me while i was in the lift (albeit i was neither there for business nor dressed that well and did look out of place). As you would expect from a 5-star hotel, the room was impeccable and clean, very comfortable for a night's rest after a long day of business meetings for your usual customers. The only pity was that there was a building being constructed right in front of the tower which blocked the infinity

title: Fantastic Exceperience and Ecxeptional Staff
desc: We spent a weekend at The Westin in Singapore and it was an experience to remember. Well located in business district of Singapore far from traffic especially in weekends. Room was very clean, spacious and well equipped the bed very comfortable, with a very spacious bathroom which had shower and bath tap. In general staff was polite and helpful at Reception, however, I would like to point out the professionalism of Concierge desk. I would like to mention among the other people the names of Shaik and Night Concierge, Eunice. They were both very friendly, willing to help with all inquiries we had and polite. A special thank goes to Khong with his smile, positivity and help he did made our day on each occasion we needed his assistance. We strongly suggest The Westin Singapore to

title: Simply done, but perfect for a business trip
desc: The Westin Singapore is deceptively contained within the upper levels of Asia Square. But with a rooftop pool, a couple of great bars - for meetings or contemplation - an excellent buffet breakfast and modern, comfortable and well appointed rooms, it has everything you need. And more: a sizable gym with good equipment and a spa if you need it.

title: Its OK but Nothing Special..
desc: located near to Marina Bay Sands. Nothing special on the room and the club lounge doesn't cater for Halal food. Went to the restaurant Cook & Brew, first time in my life I had to pay for the drinks ordered before it was served to me. I think this only happen in Singapore 5 star hotel. The staff can be bias at times. Being SPG Platinum member for almost 9 years and Ambassador status, its a shocking treatment. Welcome to Singapore!

title: Fantastic Hotel
desc: My family and I enjoyed a short stay at The Westin Singapore in June. We were extremely pleased with the level of service extended to us. Our compliments to the all the friendly Front Office staff in particularly the Assistant Front Office Manager. Breakfast was a pleasant experience. We also enjoyed the seafood buffet dinner as the selection of seafood was fresh and varied. If not mistaken, the seafood buffet dinner is only available every Friday, therefore, if you happen to be there on Fridays, check out the seafood buffet. It is definitely worth having.

title: Business hotel
desc: All around its a three star experience but for me and what they charge? St regis is around the same price and so is the W if you don't mind Sentosa. I love Sentosa and I stay there or at the St regis. Better service and better food as well.

title: Another AWESOME Staycation !!
desc: Booked 2 nights stay at the Westin Singapore. Hotel is conveniently located at CBD area where food court (Lao Pa Sat) is just 5mins walk away, so does the Downtown MRT station. Stayed in the Premium Sea View Room where I get to enjoy a view overlooking the ports and south china sea. Room was very nice and clean. Of course, their Westin Heavenly bed is indeed HEAVENLY !!! Hotel is quiet and peaceful during the weekends maybe because its more of a business hotel, which I love it. Front desk staff was very attentive and polite. Concierge team also did a great job in getting hotel guest a cab (Hotel is located a Asia Square tower 3 so getting a cab is extremely difficult. Especially peak hours). Their pool was amazing ! Just too bad there were some buildings blocking the views, else

title: Heavenly? Hardly.
desc: QUICK SUMMARY: disappointing stay, indifferent management, minimal SPG Platinum recognition, downgraded room, avoid unless no other options. I recently spent three nights at the Westin Singapore, and the good news was that it was only three nights. Having spent hundreds upon hundreds of nights in hotels around the world, I know that no hotel is perfect. They all have issues and problems. Some major and some minor, but the sign of good management and training is how these are addressed and resolved. Basically you need a management that cares about its guests, and recognizes that it is not merely renting a room, but offering a service. But what do you do when the problem with a hotel is its management, as is the case here? My advice is to avoid it, especially when any issue

title: Excellent Hotel, Fantastic Staff
desc: Spent one night at the Westin Singapore and was very impressed. From the moment I stepped out of the taxi I was treated like royalty. The room was lovely with usual Westin amenities plus some chocolates and cookies alongside a note from the Guest Relation Manager. The work area was great and provided enough room and plugs for all my stuff. It is a bit far away from everything touristy but perfect for what I needed. The staff is absolutely fantastic. They made me feel welcome and took care of all my requests and special desires immediately. Would return any time, thanks for making it a great stay!

title: Good experience
desc: I brought my best friend and her friend to Cook and brew at The Westin Hotel Singapore for the first time. We loved the ambience so much. We took quite a long time to decide on what we should have for dinner . However, the Manager on duty (Thomas Chandra) was very friendly and he recommended us few meals. On top of that, he also recommended a sweet yet tasty dessert to us that night. We loved it! Because I was addicted to one of the meal, I decided to drop by again and this time with another friend and she agreed that it was so delicious too. This time we chilled at the bar outside the restaurant and the ambience was great. I was amazed on how friendly the staffs were. There will always be a smile and everything done was in a professional manner and we felt so comfortable.

title: A Top Singapore Hotel
desc: Stayed here on business in late June and thoroughly enjoyed it. Hotel is a little off the tourist route but very good as a business location, given its proximity to the new business area of Singapore. Fully equipped in every regard .

title: I'm moving here!
desc: Last stop on a recent trip to Vietnam, Cambodia and Singapore and it was worth the wait. We only stayed one night (unfortunately), but it was great. My daughter took full advantage of the pool, my husband and I took advantage of the pool lounge and bar area (the staff here are wonderful by the way)! The front desk staff were fantastic and allowed us to change our bedding arrangements at the last second, which was incredibly helpful and as an SPG member we were given a late check out (fantastic as we had a late night flight) and free wi-fi. We tried a couple of the restaurants which were expensive, but good and the views were fantastic - if you are keen to get out and try the local food however Lau Pa Sat Hawker Centre is just across the road. The area is the business district,

title: Perfect location
desc: My feeling was that all staff at this amazing and beautiful hotel were honestly pleased and happy to greet you and help you. From the Valet team to the female manager at Seasonal Tastes (she was always there, breakfast, dinner) Shaik, the Concierge, was my star, made me feel so special and his suggestions for us to enjoy the city were right on. I had stayed one night at Marina Bay Sands prior to arriving to the Westin Singapore, and I thought that is all you need, as I felt I was staying at a water park, and not a hotel, no peace whatsoever...the Westin Singapore is the hotel for real service, peace and escape.

title: In room dining lets this hotel down
desc: The beds, as ever, are near perfect and the bathrooms are huge. My room also had a fab bath tub in the window. Lots of space for makeup, lighting in the bathroom good, hairdryer a little weird but it did work reasonably well. However, I find the choice of food from in-room dining to be poor. I asked for a gluten free Asian meal and the dish I was provided with was the worst meal I have had in 15 years since I went gluten free. Insipid, no flavour. I had to complain to 3 people to have it taken away. A big disappointment from this usually great brand.

title: Centrally located and near Public Transport
desc: More of a business hotel with good service! If you need to move around the city, the subway is just round the corner. However, it is within the Central business district, and not near Orchard Road or any of the other tourist attractions. Nearest local Dining includes the famous Lau Pa Sat, which offers good street food, but otherwise, the Dining in this area is pretty dead on the weekends, as it serves more of the office crowd.

title: Best relaxed ever
desc: This hotel is one of the best hotel that I have stayed. Your staff are very nice and always provide exceptional services, especailly, Mr. Shaik Shikel (I'm not sure that I wrote his name correctly.) - he is a concierge. I really appreciate his kind attention and super nice service. Besides, I would like to write to appreciate one of your front desk staff (I am not sure her name, but she has short hair, maybe worked in the afternoon shift and I think her name begins with Wong). She is very friendly, attentive, confident and polite. She always provides nice service and shows her attention to guests' problems. For example, at the first day, we face to problem about TV without sound. She asked about this problem and apologized when we checked out. Also, I really appreciate your

title: Excellent Stay!
desc: We had a an excellent stay at The Westin Singapore, relaxing and quiet. We were celebrating our wedding anniversary and Father's Day. We were upgraded to a higher floor and we had excellent view of the city, a nice personal touch from the hotel and also given some sweet dessert. The room is spacious and modern in design, comfortable bed, staff polite, welcoming and helpful. Love the pool and the view. Will definitely return to stay again.

title: May be best Starwood in Singapore
desc: Stayed for 7 nights. A very beyond expectation of friendly reception by all of them (most five stars employees). Ordered room dining several times and both western and local food were all delicious! The pool is nice and gorgeous infinity pool but the next door building is almost completed and the marina view are 75% gone (still can see some). Lounge was serving a variety of drinks and some food which is enough as snacks. Breakfast is quite big, serving a variety of items which is enough for the morning and after a week I was still finding new things to try. The live piano in the evenings is also amazing. If the rate is under SGD350++ for the most standard room it is a really nice place to stay.

title: A bunch of useless liars
desc: So yes, I made a mistake when booking my stay, Checking in and out a day late. Booking done through Booking.com So naturally i called both the Westin and booking.com to enquire about changing the dates on my Non refundable booking. Booking.com were incredibly helpful and did all they could but apologizing since the hotel claimed it was full the night before (first lie as the hotel confirmed personally over the phone and in person when I attempted to check in that they had rooms). Whereas the Westin staff continuously told me to deal with Booking.com as its their policy to not make changes to third party bookings. Sure, I get it, but what do we do when that this party is trying to find a solution and the hotel is blocking any way to get anything done. If they don't know how to

title: Faultless!
desc: I would not hesitate to visit this Westin again, as my recent business stay was perfect in every way. On arriving at 6am, the staff could not do enough for me, showing me personally to some quality wash/change facilities so I could get ready for work (before my room was available later in the day). On returning later, I was pleasantly surprised to learn that they had transferred my case to my room. A nice little touch that meant a lot. The room given was spacious and really modern. Everything about it in terms of its finishing was of a really high quality. To be specific, the room featured large cupboard space, a desk, large tv with patch facilities for external devices, bath, walk in shower and a large bed. On two evenings I had to use the in room dining - I wasn't

title: Good location for a business trip. Good service
desc: Excellent service for a business traveler, The food is very good and the breakfast excellent and varied to cater any taste. The pastries are a little tasteless but the bread is very good. The pool is of a good size and the gym is well equipped. Wifi service is very good everywhere in the premises. The executive lounge is woth it.

title: Staycation
desc: Came at 12 noon and room was not ready until 2.30pm. The lobby lounge is lovely, very cosy ambience. Love the complimentary drinks during check in. Room was okay. We got the cheapest rate since it was a one day staycay. View was also not impressive as it was the deluxe room. Went to the pool at noon which was the perfect time as it was not crowded. There's new buildings nearby under construction thus the view from the pool was obstructed. Honestly I believe this hotel is meant for businessman since it's near office buildings. Weekends most of the stores nearby are closed so that was pretty inconvenient. I guess if you want a staycay, maybe other hotels are better. Just my two cents.

title: Superb hotel overlooking the ocean. My favourite Westin so far.
